content: this quick and easy modern crochet dishcloth uses just 93 yards of medium weight yarn the pattern includes step-by-step photos and a video tutorial it uses only chain single_crochet and double_crochet stitches making it great for beginners and a fast make for anyone **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/47a92529ba this is just one of the patterns included in our dishcloth of the month club collection this pattern will be available as a free pdf download until april 14 2025 at 11 59 pm est new york time 23 59 for cal participants simply add the pattern to your cart before 11 59 pm est on april 14th and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on april 12 at 9 00 pm est new york time 20 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
